# How to Get Norton Internet Security 18.7.2.3 Product Key for Free

A product key is a 25-digit alphanumeric code that you can find on the back of your Norton product box or in your email confirmation if you bought it online. You need to enter this code when you install or renew your Norton subscription. But what if you don't have a product key or you lost it?
